alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Polk; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Sumter, Pasco, southeastern Hernando, Pinellas, Hillsborough and northwestern Polk Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 243 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Mascotte to near Harbor Bluffs. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Spring Hill, Clearwater, Lakeland, Largo, Pinellas Park, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Seminole, New Port Richey, Auburndale, Zephyrhills, Brooksville, Dade City, Bushnell, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Hudson, Fort Desoto Park, Holiday and Saint Petersburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for central and west central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Polk; Sumter
